definition: قط qaṭṭu (chiefly with the put tense in negative sentences) ever, (neg.:) never قطqaṭṭa u (qaṭṭ) to carve (هـ s.th.); to cut, trim, clip, pare (هـ s.th.); to mend the point (هـ of a pen), nib, sharpen (هـ a pen) II to carve, turn (هـ wood) VIII to sharpen, nib (هـ a pen) قط qaṭṭ short and curly (hair) قط qiṭṭ pl. قطط qiṭaṭ, قطاط qiṭāṭ, قططة qiṭaṭa male cat, tomcat │ قط الزباد q. az-zabād civet cat
